amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to More Than One and Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Municipality Infrastructure Aid Act:
(1) Eligible grantee means a city of the first class, city of the second class, or village with a redevelopment plan approved under the Community Development Law;
(2) Infrastructure includes water systems, sewer systems, roads, bridges, and other site development activities; and
(3) Program means the Municipality Infrastructure Aid Program created in section 19-5703.
